title: The most beautiful view of the city and bay
text: If you are going to the Baha'i gardens it's the street that lead to there anyway so..you will walking this street..enjoy!

title: Great sandwiches!
text: One of the best sandwiches in Israel and probably the best in Haifa area, great pastrami and cold meats the only thing that's make it not perfect is the price...

title: The best shawarma in Israel
text: Shawarma at its best, amazing taste, the pittas are not big and it's not cheap but the taste is divine!

title: The most amazing gardens in Israel
text:
There's a free tour couple times a day in Hebrew/English/Russian, 6 days a week except Wednesday.
Entrance is for free as well.
The gardens are amazing and beautiful, must visit in Haifa

title: Nice budget hotel
text:
The prices were pretty good, the location is good and walking distance from the bars and restaurants area at the port and also walking distance from wadi nisnas.
The rooms were clean and shower was good, old building with atmosphere

title: The best restaurant in Athens!
text:
We had an evening of great food and fun!
Had plate of hot meat cuts and few craft beers-they have only craft beer there! And how good is the combination between craft beers and meat and cheese cuts can be...Delicious! Will go back there everytime I'm in Athens!

title: Best kebab in a laffa!
text: They have all the shishlik on the grill but the best above all is the kebab shishlik and the dish in the lafa bread is the best value for money!

title: Great bar!
text:
Nice place for couples! Warm, welcoming, nice music some nice cocktails and very good atmosphere.
Prices are ok, they have only 2 draft beers..maybe 3 but besides that cool bar to visit!

title: A Must go ouzeri !
text:
Small and cozy place, food is very tasty and fresh.
Great ouzo! The staff was very welcoming.
There is nothing better than combination between fine ouzo and fresh fish!
Will return there for sure!
Ps-prices are good as well!

title: Combine with Acropolis
text:
Very beautiful neighborhood with small narrow streets and places with food and drinks and souvenirs shops.
Tip: combine it before or after you go to the Acropolis its on the way anyway;)

title: Very good kebab in a pita
text: We took the food Togo -or in a pita , didn't seat in the restaurant itself, Price was cheap(2.5 euro) for a roll with lamb kebab or gyros, was very tasty and fresh.

title: The best doner in Tel Aviv
text:
Don't miss the Iskander dish..the best in the city for sure, the dish isn't big -more
of medium size and for that it's a little bit pricy..

title: Worth the climbing
text:
Very touristic, the walk up there isn't so easy but doable, there is also a cable car but we preferred the walking.
The view from up there is great but a lot of people are there especially at sunset time.
There is a restaurant up there and also a guy with cool box that sell cold drinks/beers

title: Great kebab -good price!
text:
We ate there the 2 dishes of kebab, 1 regular and one with yogurt both very good and tasty, meat was very good and grilled perfectly so it stayed juicy !
Prices were very fair

title: Tip:free on Sunday in the winter season!
text:
The must see attraction in Athens, you need to climb up there but it's not hard at all.
We discovered it was free on Sunday in the off season and wasn't too crowded at all!

title: Good restaurant good prices
text:
The food was very good but the dishes not too big, the staff was very nice and gave us dessert and a shot of Mastika liquor on the house!
The restaurant is very cozy and warm and located in a Main Street.

title: Good airline
text:
Wasn't the cheapest flight but even in this short flight (2 hours) they give you a warm meal plus drinks which is very nice.
If would be a little cheaper would be perfect

title: Impressive
text:
A must see in Athens for sure, can spend there 2-3 hours.
Cost 5 euros which is very fair price, not too crowded

title: Coolest place in Athens
text: Good music-not mainstream, nice drinks and the best atmosphere in night life in Athens, location is good and convenient as well. Not like any other bar

title: 1 of the 2 best Donner in Tel Aviv
text: Real good Turkish Donner and food- you must try the Iskander dish! One of the best dishes in the city -very big plate but a bit pricy... The service is very good and kind. If was cheaper was sure 5 stars!

title: No online check in ...???
text:
Low cost and it's ok off course, even got water to drink one the flight but no check in at the website?? That was weird..
Price was ok but not the cheapest..

title: best value for money
text:
very good location-walking distance from everywhere in the city.
even its next to the market -the hotel and rooms are quiet.
helpful and very kind staff.
rooms are cleaned everyday
breakfast was nice and tasty.
free coffee and tea plus great cookies for Christmas/new year!

title: Good location but old
text:
Old hostel a little bit neglected, the location is good.
The hosts and all of the staff were really kind and nice.
The breakfast was small and very basic.
There wasn't soap at the bathroom.
The had very nice rooftop with a view of the city.
The price was cheap so after all if you are just looking for palace to put your head for 1night I guess it's ok.

title: Regular falafel
text: The falafel was good nothing special but the downside is that you have to pay extra for potato chips a side... That's not regular in Israel

title: Combine with the big Buddha
text:
We took the cable car for one way to the big Buddha and after that went to the small and very nice fishermen village which worth the visit even though the place itself is not that cheap to eat and drink.
Dolphins I don't believe you'll see there but the boat tour is nice and cheap.
There will be insane lines for the busses back so we just stayed there for dinner after all the tourists left there were no lines at all.

title: Prefer the bus
text: I preferred the bus which is cheaper and didn't take longer time and also got me exactly where I needed to go in Tsim sh tsui directly from the airport

title: Impressive
text: The big Buddha is really impressive and the walk up the stairs is not that long and hard as it may seems, so I highly recommend to do that!

title: Great experience!
text: We bought the ticket for the crystal bottom cable car and the view was amazing! Buy the ticket online and skip a long line to buy it there!

title: Best spot in the port
text:
For sure they have the best spot, the best view but that's just the start- the salads were amazing and kept on coming:)
The fish was good and the service was great!
Not cheap but very nice Saturday afternoon!

title: Interesting
text: My first time there, learned more about the city and the fortress, cost 37 shekels per person and included the Templar tunnel which was ok not more

title: Nothing exciting
text: Ok, short tour and not a must- got it in one ticket with the fortress so went there and expected more...

title: Best view of the bay!
text:
Was really nice to go there after noon and stayed after sunset to watch the city starts and coloring with all the lights.
Went down on the way back with a bus that was very cheap and efficient (don't let the long lines deceive you it's going on pretty fast)
The lines for the peak tram were insane

title: The nicest way to cross the river !
text:
It's old and not pricy but very effective way to get from Hong Kong to Tsim sha tsui and back.
Not as fast as the subway but we weren't in any hurry and you can see the view

title: Old and nice
text: Very very cheap and comfortable way to ride the streets of Hong Kong city, you can also watch the view not like in a subway

title: Very good airline!
text:
Best value for money, new Dreamliner airplane,good food and good service.
Oh yeah, also the best price ! ;) :)

title: Good location-that's it.
text:
The location is good, close to everything and that's a big plus.
The building was quieter than the Chungking mansions.
Was a hot water in the shower and AC and internet worked fine.
The room is very small and not that cleaned, old and falling apart.
The shower was stinking because the sewage was going up to the bathroom every night... :(
Very cheap but take under consideration all I wrote before you book

title: Nice food good beers!
text:
This is very nice brewery that I like very much !
They make their own beers and before you order they'll give you a taste of all they have from the tap, they also sell beer to take home and I even got a free glass as a souvenir from them!
Highly recommended and not pricy

title: Cheap and old
text:
Pros:
1)was the cheapest in Eilat that days..
2)in front of the central station
3)staff were friendly

Cons:
1)old
2)not clean
3)furniture sand the showers falling apart
4)everything else..
5)just a place to sleep in and go out the minute you awake

title: Very clean !
text:
It was pretty cheap hotel and surprisingly was very clean and very quiet!
It is not in the center of the city and walking to the beach can be long but that's the only downside, it is good value for money choice!

title: Good value for money:)
text:
Fresh fish and sea food for very good prices!
Staff was friendly and helpful, for sure a place to come back to!

title: Nice food and nice environment!
text: Very nice environment on the flea market area, the food is tasty and not expensive,the big sangria is big ;) been their couple of times and sure gonna visit again!

title: Very special dish!
text: It's very interesting and special..don't know how to describe it exactly..something with eggs like an omelette but much better anyway highly recommended and not pricy !
